CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1952, pg. 3, reads: "Reed and Soho Streets Fire - Four families were left homeless by this fire at 2306 Reed Street last Friday. Fire [illegible] placed damaged to the brick and wooden structure in [ill.] rear at $4,000.  Building is owned by Mrs. Virginia Hen... [ill.] restaurant owner.  Forced out by blaze were Mrs. [ill.] Andrews, Mrs. Johnnie Baldwin, and Ben Brown and their families. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Burning two story brick and frame house, 2306 Reed Street, Hill District, another version
